entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of light snow beginning early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:18 AM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:18 AM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:18 AM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023
